dcterms:description: The ViSha dataset is the largest and latest video shadow dataset, containing 120 videos with a total of 11,685 frames, corresponding to a total duration of 390 seconds of video. It is used to evaluate the effectiveness of video shadow detection methods.
dcterms:title: ViSha
